response.headline: Travel recommendations for parks and natural attractions in Noboribetsu, Hokkaido, Japan
response.summary: Bear Park, Marine Park, Sengen Park (Geyser), and Natural Footbath (River Oyunuma) are recommended places to visit in Noboribetsu. The location has 4.5M views on posts and features natural hot springs and geothermal attractions.
